actions.title: Welcome to the Discord Bot Maker Discord!
actions.author: Discord Bot Maker
actions.name: Create Embed Message

actions.message:
Discord Bot Maker (DBM) is a software to create a Discord bot using an user interface. You do not need to learn coding but you need basic knowledge on how to use a computer and Discord. 

[Website](https://dbotmaker.io/)
[Purchase on Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/682130/Discord_Bot_Maker/)
[Forum](https://dbotmaker.io/forums/)
[Documentation](https://silversunset.net/dbm/)
[Video Tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/DiscordBotMaker)

Official invite link to this Discord guild:
https://discord.gg/DMDvzSe

Before starting chatting in our server make sure to read and understand <#345694151607582732>. Thank you.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
We do not offer support. All support is given by the community - voluntarily. <@&362345159956103169> are here to moderate, not to help.
You can ping <@&372852291117514763> or <@&363047109269651458> if you require help an nobody is answered your question yet.
Thanks for your understanding.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
**How to play music?**
Please install the beta version of Discord Bot Maker in order to use music features. Then you can use "Join Voice Channel" and "Play YT Video".
**How to get the beta?**
Please make a backup of your project folder before up-/downgrading.
1. Close DBM
2. Open Steam
3. Open your software library
4. Right-click Discord Bot Maker
5. Select Properties (at the bottom)
6. Select Betas
7. Select beta in the drop down menu (no key is required)
8. DBM should update now. Otherwise restart Steam.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
**Can I get DBM for free?**
No, you need to buy it on Steam. Everything else is illegal and we will not offer you support.
**Can I get the beta for free?**
Read above.
**Can I get music functions without beta?**
Read above.
**Does DBM support Steam Family Sharing?**
Unfortunately, we do not support family sharing.
**Is DBM supported on MacOS or Linux?**
We do not support any other platform than Windows. Learn more by doing `!info mac` in <#407233336335925249>.
**When is the next update? / Where is the developer? / Is this project dead?**
Discord Bot Maker was never supposed to be a long-term project. Therefore, the developer decided to stop working on DBM. Please do not expect an update any time soon. You can use modifications to get more options.
**How can I keep my bot running 24/7?**
First of all, if you close DBM your bot will go offline. You can export your bot and start it using your command line but it will turn off if you shut down your computer. To keep your bot running 24/7 you need to rent a so called Virtual Private Server (VPS). You can either pay for a VPS or find one for free. There are a few suggestions (with tutorials), just do `!info vps` in <#407233336335925249>.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
**[X] does not exist!**
One of the actions you used is not (longer) available. This is most likely a missing modification. Make sure to copy and paste the action folder from DBM's installation directory to your project folder.
**FFMPEG not found**
This error should only occur when you are using the beta version and try to play music. First of all, do a backup of your project folder. Please click on the top left menu "File". Then click on the following two options "Install FFMPEG in Project" and "Update Music Libraries". It may take some time until both actions have completed. The error should have been resolved. Otherwise, restart your computer.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
If you would like to suggest something to be implemented, please use this command:
`!suggest [your idea]`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
You may get warned by a DBM Moderator if you don't follow our <#345694151607582732>. You can check your current warnings here:
`!warnings`

A moderator can give you 0-5 points which will be added to your account whenever you get warned.
4 points => kick
5 points => ban
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Due to the [europeean GDPR](https://gdpr-info.eu/) we are required to give you access to all personal information we store. You can request a removal of your data at any time given by messaging a DBM Moderator.
`!mydata`

The *DBM Helper* role is for users who know much about DBM. The role can be mentioned every 15 minutes by everyone who needs support. You can remove the role from yourself by using the command again.
`!helper`

This bot has been created for the Discord Bot Maker Support Discord using Discord Bot Maker. You can find more information and access to the raw data of this bot using this command:
`!botinfo`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!mute [@user] [Minutes]`
`!unmute [@user]`
`!warn [user id/@user] [Points] [(Evidence)]`
`!prune [Amount]`
`!reply [SuggestionID] [Reply]`
`!file [ActionFileName]`
`!mod-stats`
`!nick [user id] [nickname]`
`!hoistscan`

`!info-create [name] [content]`
`!info-set [name] [name/content/image_link] [new value]` very buggy :(
`!info-raw [name]`
`!warnings (user id)`
`!warning-delete [case id] (reason)`

actions.message:
Hey!
If you found a bug witin Discord Bot Maker it would be great if you could tell us more about it!
Please use the following command to submit your bug report:

**Important:** Please include the following information:
- Beta / Default version?
- What does your console / bot log tell you? 
(Please make sure to report DBM Mods related bugs in their DBM Network server!)

`!bugreport <all info here>` (min. 5 words)
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ‚úÖ Bug report ${serverVars("bug_id")} was submitted and will now be reviewed by staff.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.query:
INSERT INTO bugs (bug_id, reporter_id, description, status, queue_msg_id)
VALUES (${serverVars("bug_id")}, ${member.user.id}, "${tempVars("desc")}", 0, ${tempVars("embed-msg").id});
actions.name: Run SQL Query
Run Script

actions.message:
Hey ${tempVars("reporter").user.tag},
We are glad to tell you that your bug report (${tempVars("id")}) has been approved by a staff member and is now public. 

Thank you for your contribution!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.query:
UPDATE bugs
SET status = 1, channel_msg_id = '${tempVars("embed-msg").id}' WHERE bug_id = ${tempVars("id")}
actions.name: Run SQL Query
Run Script

actions.message:
Hey ${tempVars("reporter").user.tag},
Unfortunately your bug report (${tempVars("id")}) has been **declined** by a staff member. 

Reason:
```${tempVars("reason")}```

Thank you for understanding!
